item.title: What is custom software development in 2020
item.description: The world is eating software. üåé üç¥üåê The above is a tongue-and-cheek response to the famous words of Marc Andreessen, ‘software is eating the world’. Marc’s words hail from his wondrous post, dated 2011, and titled Why software is eating the world. In 2011, software was eating the world. A new wave of digital pathfinders were developing and launching innovative software which would inevitably take the internet by storm. We had the surgence of companies such as Amazon, Hubspot, Mailchimp, Salesforce, Pipedrive, and so on.

item.title: How to build a web app: A beginner's guide (2020)
item.description: Picture by Med Badr In this post, I‚Äôm going to show you EXACTLY how to make a web app. In fact, this is the process I‚Äôve used, revised and perfected over the last 5 years. I‚Äôve used this exact process, or a version of it to build over 15 applications of all shapes and sizes. For me, this is 100% the best way to build web applications.
